fields.question: Where is my order?
fields.answer: You will receive a status update email once your order has been shipped containing your tracking code. Follow the link in the email to track your package.

fields.question: How do I return an item?
fields.answer: To return an item, log into your account, go to 'My Orders', select the item, and click 'Return'. Follow the on-screen instructions to generate your return label.

fields.question: I received the wrong item. What should I do?
fields.answer: We're sorry about that! Please contact our customer support with your order number and a photo of the item received. We'll make it right.

fields.question: Will you restock sold out items?
fields.answer: Yes, we frequently restock popular items. Please check back in a few days.

fields.question: Why was my payment declined?
fields.answer: Your payment might be declined due to insufficient funds, incorrect card details, or issues with your bank. Please try another payment method or contact your bank.

fields.question: How long does delivery take?
fields.answer: Delivery usually takes 2-5 working days depending on your location.

fields.question: Can I track my order?
fields.answer: Yes, once your order is shipped, you’ll receive a tracking number via email to monitor your delivery status.

fields.question: Do you offer same-day delivery?
fields.answer: No, we are not offering same-day delivery at this time.

fields.question: What if my delivery is late?
fields.answer: If your delivery is overdue, please check the tracking link first. If still unresolved, contact customer support for assistance.

fields.question: Can I change my delivery address?
fields.answer: You can change the delivery address before your order is shipped by contacting customer support or accessing your account settings.

fields.question: How long do I have to return an item?
fields.answer: You have 30 days from the date of delivery to return an item for a full refund or exchange.

fields.question: Are returns free?
fields.answer: Yes, we offer free returns on all orders. A prepaid return label will be provided once your request is approved.

fields.question: When will I receive my refund?
fields.answer: Refunds are processed within 5–7 business days after we receive and inspect your returned item.

fields.question: Can I exchange an item instead of a refund?
fields.answer: No, we do not offer exchange on items.

fields.question: What if the item I received is damaged or faulty?
fields.answer: We're sorry! Please upload a photo of the damaged item through your return request. We'll arrange a replacement or refund right away.

fields.question: My order hasn't arrived. What should I do?
fields.answer: If your order is late, please check the tracking link first. If there's no update within 48 hours, contact customer service.

fields.question: I accidentally ordered the wrong item. Can I change it?
fields.answer: If your order hasn’t shipped yet, you can contact support to change or cancel it. After shipping, you can return the item.

fields.question: I received a duplicate item. What now?
fields.answer: Please contact customer support and let us know. We’ll help you return the extra item at no cost.

fields.question: An item is missing from my order. What do I do?
fields.answer: Double-check the packaging and order details. If something is missing, contact support within 7 days for assistance.

fields.question: How do I cancel an order?
fields.answer: You can cancel an order within 1 hour of placing it by visiting your account or contacting support.

fields.question: Can I pre-order out-of-stock items?
fields.answer: No, we do not accept pre-orders. We restock items regularly so please check back in a few days.

fields.question: Why are some items out of stock for so long?
fields.answer: Some items depend on supplier availability or high demand, which can delay restocking.

fields.question: What payment methods do you accept?
fields.answer: We accept Visa and MasterCard via Stripe

fields.question: Why was I charged twice?
fields.answer: If you see duplicate charges, one might be a temporary authorization. Contact support if it doesn’t disappear in 24–48 hours.

fields.question: Is it safe to use my card on your site?
fields.answer: Yes, we use secure encryption and are PCI compliant to protect your data.

fields.question: Can I use multiple payment methods?
fields.answer: At this time, we only support one payment method per order.
